LanguageData.ChangeTargetAgeDesc: Change the target age to the desired value.
LanguageData.EnterAgeMorphosisCell: Entering into the Age Morphosis Cell.
LanguageData.settings_multiplyer_desc: This is applied to the speed of age morphing.
LanguageData.settings_doMultiply_desc: If checked, the speed is multiplyed, if unchecked, the speed is divided.
LanguageData.CannotCarryToAMCell: Cannot carry to Age Morphosis Cell
